admin.add_exclusion_pattern_description: 제외 패턴을 추가합니다. *, ** 및 ?를 사용한 글로빙이 지원됩니다. "Raw"라는 디렉터리의 모든 파일을 제외하려면 "**/Raw/**"를 사용합니다. ".tif"로 끝나는 모든 파일을 제외하려면 "**/*.tif"를 사용하세요. 절대 경로의 경우, "/path/to/ignore/**"를 사용하세요.
admin.authentication_settings_description: 비밀번호, OAuth 및 기타 인증 설정 관리
admin.config_set_by_file: 구성은 현재 구성 파일에 의해 설정됩니다.
admin.confirm_delete_library_assets: 이 라이브러리를 삭제하시겠습니까? Immich에 포함된 콘텐츠 {count}개가 모두 삭제되며 되돌릴 수 없습니다. 파일은 디스크에 남아 있습니다.
admin.confirm_reprocess_all_faces: 모든 얼굴을 다시 처리하시겠습니까? 이름이 지정된 인물이 삭제됩니다.
admin.duplicate_detection_job_description: 콘텐츠에 대한 기계 학습을 실행하여 유사한 이미지를 감지합니다. 스마트 검색에 의존합니다.
admin.exclusion_pattern_description: 제외 규칙을 사용하면 라이브러리 스캔 시 특정 파일과 폴더를 제외할 수 있습니다. RAW 파일과 같은, 가져오지 않으려는 파일이 포함된 폴더가 있는 경우 유용합니다.
admin.face_detection_description: 기계 학습을 사용하여 콘텐츠 내의 얼굴을 감지합니다. 비디오의 경우 섬네일 이미지만 고려됩니다. "모두"는 모든 자산을 (재)처리합니다. "누락"은 아직 처리되지 않은 콘텐츠를 대기열에 추가합니다. 감지된 얼굴은 얼굴 인식 대기열에 추가되어 기존 혹은 새 인물로 그룹화됩니다.
admin.facial_recognition_job_description: 감지된 얼굴을 인물로 그룹화합니다. 이는 얼굴 감지가 완료된 후에 실행됩니다. "모두"는 모든 얼굴을 (재)클러스터링합니다. "누락"은 인물이 할당되지 않은 얼굴을 대기열에 추가합니다.
admin.force_delete_user_warning: 경고: 사용자와 모든 자산이 즉시 제거됩니다. 이 작업은 취소할 수 없으며, 파일을 복구할 수 없습니다.
admin.forcing_refresh_library_files: 모든 라이브러리 파일 강제 새로 고침
admin.image_format_description: WebP는 JPEG보다 크기가 작지만 인코딩 속도가 느립니다.
admin.image_prefer_embedded_preview_setting_de: 가능한 경우 RAW 사진에 포함된 미리 보기를 이미지 처리에 사용합니다. 일부 이미지에 대해 더 정확한 색상이 생성될 수 있지만, 미리 보기 품질은 카메라마다 다르며 더 많은 품질 하락이 있을 수 있습니다.
admin.image_prefer_wide_gamut_setting_descript: 섬네일에 Display P3을 사용합니다. 광색역으로 이미지의 생동감을 더 잘 보존할 수 있지만, 이전 브라우저를 사용하는 기기에서는 이미지가 다르게 나타날 수 있습니다. sRGB 이미지는 색상 왜곡을 방지하기 위해 sRGB로 유지됩니다.
admin.image_preview_resolution_description: 단일 사진을 보거나 기계 학습을 실행하는 경우 사용됩니다. 해상도가 높을수록 더 많은 세부 정보를 보존할 수 있지만, 인코딩 시간이 길어지고, 파일 크기가 커지며, 앱의 반응 속도가 느려질 수 있습니다.
admin.image_quality_description: 1-100 사이의 이미지 품질. 품질이 높을수록 파일 크기가 커지지만 더 나은 품질의 이미지를 제공합니다. 이 옵션은 미리보기 및 섬네일 이미지에 영향을 미칩니다.
admin.image_settings_description: 생성된 이미지의 품질 및 해상도 관리
admin.image_thumbnail_resolution_description: 사진 그룹을 볼 때 사용됩니다(메인 타임라인, 앨범 보기 등). 해상도가 높을수록 더 많은 세부 정보를 보존할 수 있지만, 인코딩 시간이 길어지고, 파일 크기가 커지며, 앱의 반응 속도가 느려질 수 있습니다.
admin.library_import_path_description: Specify a folder to import. This folder, including subfolders, will be scanned for images and videos.
admin.logging_level_description: 로깅이 활성화된 경우 사용할 로그 레벨입니다.
admin.machine_learning_duplicate_detection_ena: If disabled, exactly identical assets will still be de-duplicated.
admin.machine_learning_duplicate_detection_set: Use CLIP embeddings to find likely duplicates
admin.machine_learning_enabled_description: If disabled, all ML features will be disabled regardless of the below settings.
admin.machine_learning_facial_recognition_desc: 이미지 내 얼굴 감지, 인식 및 그룹화
admin.machine_learning_facial_recognition_mode: Models are listed in descending order of size. Larger models are slower and use more memory, but produce better results. Note that you must re-run the Face Detection job for all images upon changing a model.
admin.machine_learning_facial_recognition_sett: If disabled, images will not be encoded for facial recognition and will not populate the People section in the Explore page.
admin.machine_learning_max_detection_distance_: Maximum distance between two images to consider them duplicates, ranging from 0.001-0.1. Higher values will detect more duplicates, but may result in false positives.
admin.machine_learning_max_recognition_distanc: Maximum distance between two faces to be considered the same person, ranging from 0-2. Lowering this can prevent labeling two people as the same person, while raising it can prevent labeling the same person as two different people. Note that it is easier to merge two people than to split one person in two, so err on the side of a lower threshold when possible.
admin.machine_learning_min_detection_score_des: Minimum confidence score for a face to be detected from 0-1. Lower values will detect more faces but may result in false positives.
admin.machine_learning_min_recognized_faces_de: The minimum number of recognized faces for a person to be created. Increasing this makes Facial Recognition more precise at the cost of increasing the chance that a face is not assigned to a person.
admin.machine_learning_settings_description: 기계 학습 기능 및 설정 관리
admin.machine_learning_smart_search_descriptio: Search for images semantically using CLIP embeddings
admin.machine_learning_smart_search_enabled_de: If disabled, images will not be encoded for smart search.
admin.machine_learning_url_description: URL of the machine learning server
admin.metadata_extraction_job_description: 개별 콘텐츠에서 GPS, 해상도와 같은 메타데이터 정보를 추출합니다.
admin.migration_job_description: 콘텐츠용 섬네일 및 얼굴을 현재 폴더 구조로 마이그레이션합니다.
admin.note_apply_storage_label_previous_assets: Note: To apply the Storage Label to previously uploaded assets, run the
admin.note_cannot_be_changed_later: 참고: 이는 추후 변경할 수 없습니다!
admin.notification_email_from_address_descript: 보낸 사람의 이메일 주소, 예: "Immich Photo Server <noreply@immich.app>"
admin.notification_email_ignore_certificate_er: TLS 인증서 유효성 검사 오류 무시 (권장되지 않음)
admin.notification_email_password_description: 이메일 서버 인증 시 사용할 비밀번호
admin.notification_email_test_email_failed: Failed to send test email, check your values
admin.notification_email_username_description: Username to use when authenticating with the email server
admin.oauth_auto_launch_description: Start the OAuth login flow automatically upon navigating to the login page
admin.oauth_auto_register_description: Automatically register new users after signing in with OAuth
admin.oauth_mobile_redirect_uri_override_descr: Enable when 'app.immich:/' is an invalid redirect URI.
admin.oauth_storage_label_claim_description: Automatically set the user's storage label to the value of this claim.
admin.oauth_storage_quota_claim_description: Automatically set the user's storage quota to the value of this claim.
admin.oauth_storage_quota_default_description: Quota in GiB to be used when no claim is provided (Enter 0 for unlimited quota).
admin.offline_paths_description: These results may be due to manual deletion of files that are not part of an external library.
admin.repair_matched_items: Matched {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}}
admin.repaired_items: Repaired {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}}
admin.require_password_change_on_login: 사용자가 처음 로그인할 때 비밀번호를 변경하도록 요구
admin.server_external_domain_settings_descript: http(s)://를 포함한 공개 공유 링크용 도메인
admin.sidecar_job_description: Discover or synchronize sidecar metadata from the filesystem
admin.slideshow_duration_description: Number of seconds to display each image
admin.smart_search_job_description: Run machine learning on assets to support smart search
admin.storage_template_hash_verification_enabl: Enables hash verification, don't disable this unless you're certain of the implications
admin.storage_template_settings_description: 업로드하는 콘텐츠의 폴더 구조 및 파일 이름 관리
admin.theme_custom_css_settings_description: Cascading Style Sheets allow the design of Immich to be customized.
admin.thumbnail_generation_job_description: 개별 콘텐츠에 대한 크고 블러, 작은 섬네일과 각 인물에 대한 섬네일을 생성합니다.
admin.transcoding_acceleration_api_description: The API that will interact with your device to accelerate transcoding. This setting is 'best effort': it will fallback to software transcoding on failure. VP9 may or may not work depending on your hardware.
admin.transcoding_accepted_audio_codecs_descri: Select which audio codecs do not need to be transcoded. Only used for certain transcode policies.
admin.transcoding_accepted_video_codecs_descri: Select which video codecs do not need to be transcoded. Only used for certain transcode policies.
admin.transcoding_advanced_options_description: 대부분의 사용자가 변경할 필요가 없는 옵션
admin.transcoding_audio_codec_description: Opus is the highest quality option, but has lower compatibility with old devices or software.
admin.transcoding_bitrate_description: Videos higher than max bitrate or not in an accepted format
admin.transcoding_constant_quality_mode_descri: ICQ is better than CQP, but some hardware acceleration devices do not support this mode. Setting this option will prefer the specified mode when using quality-based encoding. Ignored by NVENC as it does not support ICQ.
admin.transcoding_constant_rate_factor_descrip: Video quality level. Typical values are 23 for H.264, 28 for HEVC, 31 for VP9, and 35 for AV1. Lower is better, but produces larger files.
admin.transcoding_disabled_description: 동영상을 트랜스코딩하지 않습니다. 일부 기기에서는 재생이 불가능할 수 있습니다.
admin.transcoding_hardware_acceleration_descri: Experimental; much faster, but will have lower quality at the same bitrate
admin.transcoding_hardware_decoding_setting_de: Applies only to NVENC and RKMPP. Enables end-to-end acceleration instead of only accelerating encoding. May not work on all videos.
admin.transcoding_max_b_frames_description: Higher values improve compression efficiency, but slow down encoding. May not be compatible with hardware acceleration on older devices. 0 disables B-frames, while -1 sets this value automatically.
admin.transcoding_max_bitrate_description: Setting a max bitrate can make file sizes more predictable at a minor cost to quality. At 720p, typical values are 2600k for VP9 or HEVC, or 4500k for H.264. Disabled if set to 0.
admin.transcoding_max_keyframe_interval_descri: Sets the maximum frame distance between keyframes. Lower values worsen compression efficiency, but improve seek times and may improve quality in scenes with fast movement. 0 sets this value automatically.
admin.transcoding_optimal_description: Videos higher than target resolution or not in an accepted format
admin.transcoding_preferred_hardware_device_de: Applies only to VAAPI and QSV. Sets the dri node used for hardware transcoding.
admin.transcoding_preset_preset_description: Compression speed. Slower presets produce smaller files, and increase quality when targeting a certain bitrate. VP9 ignores speeds above `faster`.
admin.transcoding_reference_frames_description: The number of frames to reference when compressing a given frame. Higher values improve compression efficiency, but slow down encoding. 0 sets this value automatically.
admin.transcoding_required_description: Only videos not in an accepted format
admin.transcoding_settings_description: Manage the resolution and encoding information of the video files
admin.transcoding_target_resolution_descriptio: Higher resolutions can preserve more detail but take longer to encode, have larger file sizes, and can reduce app responsiveness.
admin.transcoding_temporal_aq_description: Applies only to NVENC. Increases quality of high-detail, low-motion scenes. May not be compatible with older devices.
admin.transcoding_threads_description: Higher values lead to faster encoding, but leave less room for the server to process other tasks while active. This value should not be more than the number of CPU cores. Maximizes utilization if set to 0.
admin.transcoding_tone_mapping_description: Attempts to preserve the appearance of HDR videos when converted to SDR. Each algorithm makes different tradeoffs for color, detail and brightness. Hable preserves detail, Mobius preserves color, and Reinhard preserves brightness.
admin.transcoding_tone_mapping_npl_description: Colors will be adjusted to look normal for a display of this brightness. Counter-intuitively, lower values increase the brightness of the video and vice versa since it compensates for the brightness of the display. 0 sets this value automatically.
admin.transcoding_transcode_policy_description: Policy for when a video should be transcoded. HDR videos will always be transcoded (except if transcoding is disabled).
admin.transcoding_two_pass_encoding_setting_de: Transcode in two passes to produce better encoded videos. When max bitrate is enabled (required for it to work with H.264 and HEVC), this mode uses a bitrate range based on the max bitrate and ignores CRF. For VP9, CRF can be used if max bitrate is disabled.
admin.transcoding_video_codec_description: VP9 has high efficiency and web compatibility, but takes longer to transcode. HEVC performs similarly, but has lower web compatibility. H.264 is widely compatible and quick to transcode, but produces much larger files. AV1 is the most efficient codec but lacks support on older devices.
admin.trash_number_of_days_description: Number of days to keep the assets in trash before permanently removing them
admin.untracked_files_description: 애플리케이션에서 추적되지 않는 파일들입니다. 이동 실패, 업로드 중단 또는 버그로 인해 발생할 수 있습니다.
admin.user_delete_delay_settings_description: Number of days after removal to permanently delete a user's account and assets. The user deletion job runs at midnight to check for users that are ready for deletion. Changes to this setting will be evaluated at the next execution.
admin.user_password_has_been_reset: The user's password has been reset:
admin.user_password_reset_description: Please provide the temporary password to the user and inform them they will need to change the password at their next login.
admin.version_check_enabled_description: Enable periodic requests to GitHub to check for new releases
admin.video_conversion_job_description: 폭넓은 브라우저 및 기기와의 호환성을 위한 비디오 트랜스코드.

album_added_notification_setting_descrip: 공유 앨범에 추가되면 이메일 알림을 받습니다.
album_updated_setting_description: Receive an email notification when a shared album has new assets
albums_count: {count, plural, one {{count, number} Album} other {{count, number} Albums}}
confirm_delete_shared_link: Are you sure you want to delete this shared link?
custom_locale_description: 언어와 지역에 따른 날짜와 숫자의 형식을 지정하세요.
default_locale_description: Format dates and numbers based on your browser locale
delete_api_key_prompt: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
display_original_photos_setting_descript: Prefer to display the original photo when viewing an asset rather than thumbnails when the original asset is web-compatible. This may result in slower photo display speeds.

errors.paths_validation_failed: {paths, plural, one {# path} other {# paths}} failed validation
errors.quota_higher_than_disk_size: You set a quota higher than the disk size
errors.repair_unable_to_check_items: Unable to check {count, select, one {item} other {items}}
errors.unable_to_change_album_user_role: Unable to change the album user's role
errors.unable_to_copy_to_clipboard: Cannot copy to clipboard, make sure you are accessing the page through https
errors.unable_to_create_api_key: 새 API 키를 생성할 수 없습니다.
errors.unable_to_remove_album_users: Unable to remove users from album
errors.unable_to_update_timeline_display_status: 타임라인 표시 상태를 업데이트할 수 없습니다.

find_them_fast: Find them fast by name with search

interval.hours: Every {hours, plural, one {hour} other {{hours, number} hours}}

loop_videos_description: Enable to automatically loop a video in the detail viewer.
memories_setting_description: Manage what you see in your memories
name: 이름
no_albums_message: 앨범을 생성하여 당신의 이미지와 동영상을 정리하세요.
no_archived_assets_message: Archive photos and videos to hide them from your Photos view
no_explore_results_message: Upload more photos to explore your collection.
no_favorites_message: Add favorites to quickly find your best pictures and videos
no_libraries_message: Create an external library to view your photos and videos
no_shared_albums_message: Create an album to share photos and videos with people in your network
note_apply_storage_label_to_previously_u: Note: To apply the Storage Label to previously uploaded assets, run the
note_unlimited_quota: 참고: 0 입력 시 할당량 제한이 없습니다.
offline_paths_description: These results may be due to manual deletion of files that are not part of an external library.
partner_can_access_assets: All your photos and videos except those in Archived and Deleted
partner_can_access_location: The location where your photos were taken

past_durations.days: Past {days, plural, one {day} other {{days, number} days}}
past_durations.hours: Past {hours, plural, one {hour} other {{hours, number} hours}}
past_durations.years: Past {years, plural, one {year} other {{years, number} years}}

people_sidebar_description: Display a link to People in the sidebar
permanent_deletion_warning_setting_descr: Show a warning when permanently deleting assets
photos_count: {count, plural, one {{count, number} Photo} other {{count, number} Photos}}
repair_no_results_message: 추적되지 않거나 누락된 파일이 여기에 표시됩니다.
require_user_to_change_password_on_first: Require user to change password on first login
sharing_sidebar_description: Display a link to Sharing in the sidebar
show_in_timeline_setting_description: Show photos and videos from this user in your timeline
stop_photo_sharing_description: {partner} will no longer be able to access your photos.
stop_sharing_photos_with_user: Stop sharing your photos with this user
theme_selection_description: 브라우저의 시스템 기본 설정에 따라 라이트 모드와 다크 모드를 자동으로 설정합니다.
trash_no_results_message: 휴지통으로 이동한 이미지와 동영상이 이곳에 표시됩니다.
trashed_items_will_be_permanently_delete: Trashed items will be permanently deleted after {days, plural, one {# day} other {# days}}.
untracked_files_decription: 애플리케이션에서 추적되지 않는 파일들입니다. 이동 실패, 업로드 중단 또는 버그로 인해 발생할 수 있습니다.
video_hover_setting_description: 마우스를 동영상 섬네일 위에 올리면 자동으로 재생됩니다. 비활성화된 경우에도 재생 아이콘에 마우스를 올리면 자동으로 재생됩니다.
